job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Engineer, Applied AI Integration Internship
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a talented engineering intern with a strong foundation in AI/ML to explore opportunities for improving diagnostics of infotainment issues (e.g., Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Audio, Display) based on vehicle/service data and customer service requests.
   What You'll Do
     * Work with vast sources of Service-related data to infer top impacting issues
     * Leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) and data analysis to better understand and categorize customer service requests
     * Utilize fleet-wide data to prototype ML models that reduce the time needed to diagnose and root cause new infotainment issues
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer, Applied AI Integration Internship

We are seeking a talented engineering intern with a strong foundation in AI/ML to explore opportunities for improving diagnostics of infotainment issues (e.g., Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Audio, Display) based on vehicle/service data and customer service requests.
   What You'll Do
     * Work with vast sources of Service-related data to infer top impacting issues
     * Leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) and data analysis to better understand and categorize customer service requests
     * Utilize fleet-wide data to prototype ML models that reduce the time needed to diagnose and root cause new infotainment issues

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) and data analysis to understand customer service requests and prototype ML models for diagnostics. This aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on generative models and building applications around them, rather than purely predictive modeling.

phrases: Work with vast sources of Service-related data to infer top impacting issues
Utilize fleet-wide data to prototype ML models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to process and utilize large datasets ('vast sources of Service-related data', 'fleet-wide data') for the purpose of inferring issues and building models, which are core aspects of data engineering.

phrases: prototype ML models that reduce the time needed to diagnose and root cause new infotainment issues
job_tasks.justification: The explicit mention of 'Large Language Models (LLMs)' and 'prototype ML models' directly points to the core modeling activities, including the adaptation and application of generative models for specific problem-solving.

phrases: Software Engineer, Applied AI Integration Internship
explore opportunities for improving diagnostics of infotainment issues
job_tasks.justification: The title 'Software Engineer' and the goal of 'improving diagnostics' suggest that the work will involve integrating AI capabilities into a functional system or application, which falls under software development.

skills: reduce the time needed to diagnose and root cause
